article.title: ManTech Receives $151 Million Information Technology Support Contract from the U.S. Naval Sea Systems Command
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: ManTech International Corporation has received a five-year, $151 million task order to provide information technology (IT) support to the Naval Sea Systems Command, SEA 04L3. ManTech will provide IT support to the Navy's legacy ship maintenance and logistics support information systems program, including the development of formal processes in life cycle planning, documentation, program management, program control, testing, training and deployment.
